metadata.description: Height growth parameters for the Lake States variant
metadata.source: FVS LS variant htgf.f; Carmean NC-128 site index curves
metadata.notes: LS variant uses Curtis-Arney height-diameter relationship for large trees. Height growth is derived from the H-D curve (new height from new diameter). The BALMOD competition modifier reduces growth for suppressed trees. Carmean curve coefficients are stored here for potential future use.

balmod_coefficients._description: BALMOD = max(0.0, 1.0 - HTBAL * (BAL/BA - 0.3)) when BAL/BA > 0.3, else 1.0
balmod_coefficients._note: HTBAL is species-specific, ranges 0.0-0.5. Higher = more sensitive to competition.
